<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Jurgrindor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2219)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />

<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 31

**Perception** +9; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[battered breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50
(currently 25)

</row>

**Wounded Arm** Jurgrindor's left arm is dreadfully wounded, courtesy of Amiri's greatsword. The discomfort of this wound causes Jurgrindor to take a –2 circumstance penalty to his Armor Class and Strikes (these modifications are included in his stats). At the end of each of his turns, Jurgrindor must succeed at a DC 12 flat check or the wound begins to bleed again, dealing him 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). He can't use [Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7) or [Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38) (as typical giants) until he's healed back to full hit points.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 bludgeoning

**Chill Breath** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)) Jurgrindor breathes out a 15-foot cone of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing 2d6 cold damage (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that critically fails the save is also [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 18). Jurgrindor can't use Chill Breath for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
